data.name: Ladybug Quest - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Ladybug Quest soundtrack features 40+ minutes of original music composed exclusively for the game.

Included Tracks:


On a Quest - 0:57
Out Adventuring - 1:01
Ancient Legend - 2:18
Sunshine in the Grove - 1:49
Lazy River - 1:53
Firefly Forest - 1:49
Midnight - 1:40
Isle of Aphids - 3:00
Sinking Swamp - 2:33
Temple of the Venus - 2:01
Elevated Adventure - 2:00
Rainy Evening - 1:36
Piranha Bypass - 3:43
The Cave Dweller - 1:20
African Grassland - 1:36
Pyramid of Light - 1:08
Windy Heights - 2:28
Floating Islands - 2:20
Careless Beaches - 1:46
Deep Jungle - 3:37
The Ancient Legend - 2:15
Icy Breeze - 1:45

data.short_description: The Ladybug Quest soundtrack features 40+ minutes of original music composed exclusively for the game.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Fully DX11 supported card.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04, SteamOS
  • Processor: 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX9 (shader model 3.0) or DX11 with feature level 9.3 capabilities.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 13.0, SteamOS+
  • Processor: 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Fully DX11 supported card.
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
